data.title: Neil Young on LinkedIn: Come and join our amazing colleagues at DMU!
data.meta_description: Come and join our amazing colleagues at DMU!
data.text: üåü Exciting Opportunity Alert! üåü Are you ready to take your career to new heights? We're on the lookout for a talented individual to join us as a People Services Support Manager at our prestigious university! üîç About the Role: As the People Services Support Manager, you'll lead our dedicated People Services Hub and Operations team. Your mission? To ensure seamless service delivery and enhance the employee experience. From overseeing day-to-day operations to driving continuous improvement initiatives, you'll play a pivotal role in shaping our HR landscape. üíº What We're Looking For: ‚úÖ Proven track record in customer service management, ideally within a contact centre or HR operational setting. ‚úÖ Strong leadership skills to inspire and motivate teams toward service excellence. ‚úÖ Experience in HR operations, coupled with a solid grasp of employment legislation and procedures. ‚úÖ Stellar communication and stakeholder management abilities to foster meaningful relationships. ‚úÖ A strategic thinker with a knack for problem-solving and a commitment to diversity and inclusion. üöÄ Why Join Us? At our university, we're committed to fostering growth and innovation. As a member of our team, you'll have the opportunity to make a real difference, drive positive change, and shape the future of our institution. With a supportive environment, ample room for growth, and a culture of collaboration, your journey with us promises to be both rewarding and fulfilling. Plus, enjoy the flexibility of a hybrid work model, with only two days required in the office each week! Ready to seize this exciting opportunity? Click the link in the comments to learn more about the role and submit your application today! Let's embark on this journey together. #JoinOurTeam #CareerOpportunity #HRManagement #HigherEdJobs #DeMontfortUniversity
